name: Rage Runner (itch)
description:
Rage Runner is simple: Dodge the cars and collect coins. To execute that? You'll have to see for yourself...

Run your way to fortune on a road of dangerous drivers and collect coins whilst defending yourself with powerups! Can you beat the rage? What are you waiting for? Find out now!

WASD to move, collect the coins and shield powerups as the road goes down.

Press F11 on your browser to have the best experience.

Please comment ideas for future updates!
